TURSG.IS.summary: TÃ¼rkiye Sigorta Anonim Sirketi operates as a non-life insurance company in Turkey. The company offers automotive and non-automotive accident, fire, transportation, engineering, health, agriculture, liabilities, financial losses, loan, and legal protection insurance products. It also provides home, motor, workplace, personal accident, and yacht insurances, as well as reinsurance products. The company was formerly known as GÃ¼nes Sigorta Anonim Sirketi and changed its name to TÃ¼rkiye Sigorta Anonim Sirketi in August 2020. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. TÃ¼rkiye Sigorta Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of TVF Finansal Yatirimlar AS.
